Malaria.diagnosis: Se idanwo eje lati mo boya o ni malaria.

symptoms: Ara n gbona fun igba pipẹ
Mi o le tu ara silẹ daadaa
Typhoid Fever.diagnosis: Se idanwo eje ati ito re (Widal test).

symptoms: E mi n nira fun mi
Pneumonia.diagnosis: Ki won wo ayà re (X-ray), ki won tun se idanwo eje ati sputum.

symptoms: Mo n lo si ile-igbọnsẹ pupọ
Diabetes.diagnosis: Se idanwo suga ninu eje re.

Hypertension.diagnosis: Wọn gbọdọ fi ẹrọ to iwọn titẹ ẹ̀jẹ̀ rẹ.

symptoms: E mi n nira fun mi
Mo n fe fọnka pẹ̀lú ariwo
Asthma.diagnosis: Ki won se idanwo e mi ati peak flow.

symptoms: Mo n fe fọnka fun igba to gun
Mo n se pupọ ni alẹ
Tuberculosis.diagnosis: Se idanwo X-ray ayà, sputum, ati idanwo ara.

symptoms: Mo n fe fọnka lai si omi
E mi n nira fun mi
Mi o le ri adun ounje, mi o le ri oorun
COVID-19.diagnosis: Se idanwo PCR tabi rapid test.

symptoms: Egungun mi n dun mi gan
Eje n jade lati enu mi
E mi n nira fun mi

Food Poisoning.diagnosis: Se idanwo lori ito ati eje.

symptoms: Oju mi ko le farabalẹ si imọlẹ
Migraine.diagnosis: Dokita ni yoo ba e sọrọ ati ki e maa ko bi ori se n se yin.

Arthritis.diagnosis: Ki won wo egungun re (X-ray), ki won se idanwo eje, ki dokita ba e wo.

symptoms: Awọ mi ti n yọ ofeefee
Hepatitis B.diagnosis: Se idanwo Hepatitis B, ki won tun wo bi ẹdọ se n sise.

symptoms: Ara mi n fẹ omi pupọ
Ori mi n dun mi ni oju
Omi n bọ lati inu imu mi
Sinusitis.diagnosis: Ki won wo imu re, ki won tun se CT scan.

symptoms: Ara mi lo kan ju bẹẹ lo (apakan ara mi ko ṣiṣẹ)
Oro nira fun mi lati sọ
Stroke.diagnosis: Se idanwo CT, MRI, ati eje.

symptoms: Eyin mi n dun mi to lagbara
Mo n ni irora nigba mo ba n to
Eje n jade ninu ito mi
Kidney Stones.diagnosis: Se idanwo ultrasound, CT scan ati ito.

symptoms: Inu mi n dun mi gan
Appendicitis.diagnosis: Se ultrasound, CT scan ati idanwo eje.

Peptic Ulcer.diagnosis: Se endoscopy ati idanwo fun H. pylori.

Meningitis.diagnosis: Se lumbar puncture, idanwo eje, MRI.

symptoms: Mo n fe fọnka nigba gbogbo
E mi n nira fun mi
Bronchitis.diagnosis: Ki won wo ayà re (X-ray), ki won se idanwo sputum.

Gastroenteritis.diagnosis: Se idanwo lori ito ati eje.

symptoms: E mi n nira fun mi
Heart Attack.diagnosis: Se ECG, idanwo eje, ati coronary angiogram.

symptoms: Egungun ni ayika (lymph nodes) n tobi
Mo n se pupọ ni alẹ
HIV/AIDS.diagnosis: Se idanwo HIV ati CD4 count.

symptoms: Ato awọ ara mi n ya
Chickenpox.diagnosis: Ki dokita ba e wo, se PCR test.

symptoms: Mo le ma le fi oju si nkan
Epilepsy.diagnosis: Se EEG, MRI, ki dokita ba e wo.

symptoms: Ona kekere n yọ lori ara mi
Mo n fọ ara mi de pipọn
Mi o fẹran nkan ti mo maa n fẹran
Depression.diagnosis: Dokita mind (psychologist) ni yoo sọrọ pelu e.

symptoms: Omi alaimọ n jade lati ibalopo
Irora nigba mo ba n to
Gonorrhea.diagnosis: Se idanwo lab fun gonorrhea (NAAT, culture).
